children.markdown: ### [Universal DB Frontend](/#/table/config/dj-database) Connect to any SQL or NoSQL database, browse, search, and edit its contents. Extend the schema on the fly. [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zXXtR9zSOXs)

### [Artificial Intelligence](https://dashjoin.github.io/platform/latest/ai-ml-integration/)

Seamlessly incorporate large language models, image classification, and translation (I18N) in a GDPR compliant way.

### [Query Catalog & Editor](/#/table/config/dj-query-catalog) Automatically collect schema information that powers an intuitive graphical query editor! [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yxjE8GgXtfo)

### [Layout Designer](/#/table/config/page) Graphically customize the layout for different types found in the database. Leverage the query editor to include meaningful charts. [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RuM-im9wd58)
### [Functions and Processes](/#/table/config/dj-function) Seamlessly start and integrate REST services from the application and monitor progress. [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XuymQh6aMIk)

### Data Integration and Federation Visually map external data sources to your model. Load the data into a warehouse or federate the source into a virtual linked-data graph. [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZsjyucALidY)

### [Getting Started & Cloud Deployment](https://dashjoin.com/#getstarted) Download the platform or deploy the apps in your private cloud or book our PaaS service. All apps scale horizontally and support state of the art cloud stacks. [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_xmFRwhbAFA)

### [Rich Support Matrix](/#/page/Info) Dashjoin supports a wide variety of SQL and NoSQL databases. You can construct queries in a uniform way and you can even define relationships between record from different databases and database types in order to enable a seamless browsing experience. [](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_itCZjvw9D8)
